name: Kap in Acid Collapse
description:
This is my 2D Platformer.

A game about the hero Kap trying to escape a disaster.

"Once upon a time Kap worked in a crystal mining plant. It was a dangerous job as the crystals were mined from acid mines. And then one day Acid collapse happened..."

Works well on full screen. To exit full screen mode use "Escape".

The following mods have been added to the game:

August, 2021

     New Features

         - Developed and inplemented story about player Kap;

         - Added new levels;

         - Developed and implemented two NPS;

         - Added dialogues whith NPS;

         - Added overall map and images of rocket;

         - Implemented cut-scene using TimeLine;

         - Improvemented Enemis walking logics.

Created by Natalia for the course "Game Design and Development 2: 2D Platformer" https://www.coursera.org/learn/game-design-and-development-2?specialization=game-design-and-development 

In production the game were used the materials (Project Assets, ets. ) of the course "Game Design and Development 2: 2D Platformer" .
